{"id":534413327,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1628284961,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"120 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/534413327/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"83.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        if(nums.size() <= 1)\n            return 0;\n        \n        unordered_map<int, int> m;\n        m[0] = -1;\n        int sum = (nums[0] == 0) ? -1 : 1;\n        m[sum] = 0;\n        int maxSub = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++)\n        {\n            sum = (nums[i] == 0) ? sum - 1 : sum + 1;\n            \n            if(m.find(sum) == m.end())\n                m[sum] = i;\n            \n            else if(i - m[sum] > maxSub)\n                maxSub = i - m[sum];\n        }\n        \n        return maxSub;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
